Python.name: Rafia - Idle Clicker Game
Python.description: A cozy idle clicker game about collecting trash, built in Godot 4.x with GDScript. Features generators, prestige system, and collectible items.

Python.name: Electronics Inventory System
Python.description: Web-based inventory management system for tracking electronics components, connected to Google Sheets with full CRUD operations.

Python.name: Network Tester
Python.description: Ethernet network testing tool for diagnosing network connectivity and performance issues.

Python.name: Dart Algorithm
Python.description: Uses a camera to watch a dartboard and automatically detect where each new dart lands by comparing each frame to a reference image. It identifies the dart’s location, determines the correct score based on distance and angle, and keeps track of the player’s running total—essentially turning a normal dartboard into a smart, self-scoring system.

JavaScript.name: Personal Website
JavaScript.description: Portfolio website with dark mode, responsive design, and interactive skills section. Built with Bootstrap and vanilla JavaScript.

JavaScript.name: Electronics Inventory Frontend
JavaScript.description: Client-side inventory management interface with search, filtering, and CSV export functionality.

C/C++.description: Various microcontroller and embedded systems projects using C/C++ for hardware control and communication.

C/C++.description: Robot control systems and automation projects developed during university coursework.

Java.name: Object-Oriented Programming Projects
Java.description: University coursework projects demonstrating OOP principles, data structures, and algorithms.

Git/Version Control.name: Version Control Workflow
